name: The Evolution
description: Adds a new character: The Evolution. NL NL Weilding the powers of a fallen god this shapeshifter climbs the Spire to save her fading worlds.
credits: NL - Syvaron for the card art and the game that inspired this character. If you are above 18 or 21 years old you can check out his game, Portals of Phereon. NL - Johnny Devo for the Mystic, which I used as a base. There are a few assets haven't replaced yet such as the character model, those are his. NL - The STS modding community on Discord. Thanks for your help and companionship!
